name: 𝐒𝐇𝐀𝐃𝐎𝐖 𝐃𝐈𝐌𝐌𝐄𝐑
description:
PlayStation Talents Awards 2022 finalists🏆

A third-person adventure game with riddles, puzzles and melee combat, where you must focus all your attention on controlling your own character and the environment.

Using the ability "shadow immersion" you will be able to move through places where you would not be able to in a corporeal form, climb walls and ceilings, avoid enemies, move in a more agile way against bosses, etc.  

Light has always symbolised peace and tranquillity, knowing what is around us makes us feel comfortable and safe.  The concept of the game tries to invert this fact so that darkness becomes this symbol where the player feels really safe.  

Search for the members of your tribe, decipher the luminescent paintings, discover the hidden clues and solve the puzzles to find out what happened.

Remember... 

Shadows will be your best allies, dive into them to discover the TRUTH.
